short_summary: Fat Laboratory Extractor Purchasing, Delivery, and Installation
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, is issuing the procurement of a Fat Laboratory Extractor for the Public Works and Government Services Department.
full_summary:
**Title - Titre**
01755-240569 - Fat Laboratory Extractor for AAC Sherbrooke - Request for Proposal [RFP]

**Reference - Référence**
WS4284660033-Doc4284717420

**Publication Date - Date de Publication**
December 12, 2023

**Tender Closing Date - Date de Clôture**
January 11, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**United Nations Standard Products and Services Code - Code Uniforme des Produits et Services des Nations Unies**
*41104800 - Laboratory Decanting and Distilling, Evaporating, and Extracting Equipment and Supplies*

**Trade Agreement - Accord Commerical**
*Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*

**Procurement Method - Méthode d'Approvisionnement**
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria - Criteres de Sélection**
Lowest Price

**Countries subject to trade agreements - Pays Soumis aux Accords Commerciaux**
*Canada*

**Contracting Authority - Autorité Contractante**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End_UserDepartment - Ministère Entité Utilisateur**
*Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)*
K.W. Neatby Bldg, 960 Carling Ave
Ottawa, Ontario, K1Y 4X2, Canada

**Contact Information - Informations de Contact**

Julie Carbonneau
Procurement Specialist
*Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)*
Email: [julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: DDP = demande de propositions (request for proposal) in French. PSPC/TPSGC and AAC/AAC are French and English-language abbreviations for government agencies. You may modify or remove these if you prefer.  Also, note that the contact info for phone, fax and address is missing in the original tender document, so it is not included in the rewritten version. If you want to add it, you would need to ask for it from the contractor   

 Let me know if there are any other changes I can do!  Have any 400-word limit would
